articles.title: Aditya-L1: Why 2026 will be a year like no other for India’s Sun mission - BBC
articles.description: For the first time Aditya-L1 will be able to watch the Sun in its maximum activity cycle.
articles.content:
A coronal mass ejection can be several times larger than Earth
For Aditya-L1, India's first solar observation mission in space, the year 2026 is expected to be like no other.
It's the first time th… [+5395 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: America’s favourite cooking oil linked to obesity, scientists find - The Times of India
articles.description: A recent study reveals that soybean oil, a common ingredient in American diets, may be significantly contributing to the obesity crisis. The research identifies metabolic pathways that explain weight gain associated with this prevalent cooking oil, urging for…
